articles.author: Filip Timotija
articles.title: Smithsonian slated to restore Trump impeachment exhibit - The Hill
articles.description: The Smithsonian’s National Museum of American History said it is slated to restore the placard with information about President Trump’s two impeachments after removing it from the exhibit last month.  The museum said in a Saturday statement that the section w…
